title: Green Cap
summaries: The Green Cap is (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) a piece of armor / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) a vanity item. It will always drop from the Guide, but only when his name is Andrew. On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, the Guide will always drop the Green Cap, regardless of his name.

statistics.Defense: 2 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
statistics.Sell: 50 SC
